website_summaries.verdict: On the expensive side, but still a great gift idea for any wet shavers on the list. Attractive packaging neatly holds everything necessary for a close shave, including a healthy organic shave soap and aftershave oil.
pros: Packaged in a unique wooden "cigar box" container
Especially good for sensitive skin issues
Aftershave oil is very soothing, and only lightly scented
cons: Razor handle is short, some users may want to find a longer one
Some allergic reactions to soap reported

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, well crafted and received gift for husband
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, well crafted and received gift for husband, he is picky and very hard to impress or surprise and he was both! The cigar box totally through him off and all items were displayed beautifully. He is new to the luxury shaving but seems to really enjoy it and all the products, great starting kit for an impressive gift and well worth the value, arrived fast, no complaints, love it! All items shown were received including the brush holder. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: J & K Link

customer_reviews.title: This is a classy, well built shaving kit. ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a classy, well built shaving kit. It should however include a brush and razor stand. The brush “stand” pictured is plastic and really made more for packaging purposes. It’s not practical as a counter stand. Had it included a proper stand I’d give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Very nice kit
customer_reviews.text: My first time using a razor like this and I am pleased to say I mastered it. Shaves so close it’s refreshing. The shave soap and body soap are awesome. Razor is classy looking and the brush is top notch. Didn’t try the after shave oil because I just don’t use oil after shaving I always use light moisturizer. I read mixed reviews about the blades but the ones in the kit worked great. This was a gift to myself.
customer_reviews.author: bonna bing

customer_reviews.title: Too bad they didn't leave a stogie in there too
customer_reviews.text: Everything seems to be high quality--even the wooden cigar box its packed in has dovetail joinery. Too bad they didn't leave a stogie in there too. Seriously though, the brush is super soft and has a nice, heavy handle. Razor also feels substantial and is easy to grip. The shaving soap feels and smells good as does the after-shave balm. I have very sensitive skin and so far it seems to agree with me. The one thing that I found somewhat tacky is the plastic brush stand. Would be nice if there were a stainless steel or similar stand to hold the brush and razor when not in use. All in all, it seems to be a worthy product.
customer_reviews.author: Poopchin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful HIGH QUALITY Gift Set - Very Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: BEAUTIFUL GIFT set highly recommended because my fiancé was so impressed with the quality and presentation of this set. Everything from the leather bag, to the bristles of the brush, to the beautiful handles of the brush was so well done and beautiful and the quality was SUPERB! If you’re looking for a gift you won’t find any nicer, especially at this price!
customer_reviews.author: S-Florida

customer_reviews.title: Great as a gift or for yourself
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was lovely everything packed os nice in the travel bag. I bought this for myself and I love it. everything you need for wet shaving, also everything is organic, and speaking as a person with sensitive skin, and I have been using this for over a month and not to have any bumps is a god send.
customer_reviews.author: Shidoshi Hickson

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my boyfriend's birthday and he absolutely loved it. Packaging in a cigar box is a nice touch, gives it a vintage vibe. The soap and lotion have a pleasant sent, they don't overpower. I love that they are made with organic ingredients which is great for someone with sensitive skin. He really enjoyed shaving with this set, seeing as it was his first time shaving with a saftey razor it was a good experience.
customer_reviews.author: Kira

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift for my husband
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my husband. He has sensitive skin and a lot of shave products irritate him. These products including the body soap have really improved his skin, and he says it feels much better. It's no longer dry or irritated. The safety razor gives a nice smooth shave. Everything has a light herbal scent which we both find nice, and the set is beautifully packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Stunning high quality shaving kit your man will love
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit for my fiancé as a birthday gift. He loved the beautiful leather bag it came in. All items are high quality and standard. He loved the stand, the amazing brush and the handle. Soap box made of wood and gorgeous. I loved the look of satisfaction as he was going through his gift bag. Absolutely recommend this as a gift for your man! It’s worth every dollar and for the quality you get he will think it’s worth more than what you had paid.
customer_reviews.author: luda nesterchuk

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this beautiful kit AND it comes with a STAND!
customer_reviews.text: This kit is just GORGEOUS and comes with everything you need! The quality of razor, brush, stand, soap with wooden bowl, oils and bag is superb. I could pass this set off for way more than $150. The faux horn detail on razor and brush handles is elegant and classy. The all-natural soap smells amazing and doesn't remind you of cheap deodorant that's in those store brand shaving creams. And since it's a family run small business, the owner emailed me to make sure everything arrived and that I was happy. There was only one issue but I think they will resolve it, as they have great customer service. Will be back to purchase from them again!
customer_reviews.author: N.H.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I decided to go all out for my first wet shave kit and picked this after reading some reviews. I’m overall very satisfied by the product, though I’m not sure I would buy the shaving soap or oils again given my other vast alternatives out there. That being said, I liked everything in the package.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set, great as a gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband as a father's day gift. He loves this set. He had never used anything but a Gillette razor and this is now his go to. The razors are super cheap to replace and it seems it'll last a lifetime. Beautiful set
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa H.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My husband had the mechanism on wrong and thought the blades were the wrong size. After looking into it and adjusting he got it right and it works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: J from South Texas

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my purchase! I love how everything comes neat in the wooden box and how it was packed. The products are of very good quality and they smell great! They all came as what I have imagined. I purchased this for my boyfriend to try and I'm sure he'll love it. It'll definitely be a wonderful beginning experience for him. The seller is very nice as well. As soon as you place your order, he directly contacts you for any questions or concerns. I will definitely order another in the near future for my brother!
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: Great wet shaving starter kit
customer_reviews.text: basically has everything you need to enter the world of wet shaving. little to my knowledge, there's quite a cult following of wet shaving as it can be very meditative
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Husband Loves
customer_reviews.text: This was a Fathers Day gift for my Husband and he absolutely loves it. The box was so nicely packaged. The soap suds up very well for a clean close shave. He does not break out when using these products which is awesome. He has super sensitive skin. Wish it came with a stand, had to purchase that separately.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer P.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Products, Excellent Service
customer_reviews.text: Just started shaving with a safety razor and decided to go with this kit. Some quality products for a decent price (compared to some brushes and razors out there). Great way to start shaving wet. Eventually may want to upgrade the brush and razor, but I'm definitely happy with the products for the foreseeable future. Also, the owner contacted me directly, which just shows his dedication to clientele and the boutique nature of his business. Hope to see more of his products soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... kit 3 days ago and I have fallen in love with it
customer_reviews.text: I received my shaving kit 3 days ago and I have fallen in love with it. I learned to shave with something similar my dad had when I was a kid, so it's nice to get back to it. It was elegantly packaged and I will enjoy this kit for years to come. Thank you for this wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Kemp

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves it
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his new shaving kit. It arrived beautifully packaged in a wooden box. Everything looks to be well made. I also ordered the stand for razor and brush as well as the French soap which has a lovely smell. He used it this morning and enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: busy mom

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this entire product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this entire product. Everything in the case is top quality. I will be purchasing from this company again for sure.Thank you so much for a fantastic product.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew M.

customer_reviews.title: AAA+++
customer_reviews.text: I'm tired of 20$ store razors. I decided to go back to an old school razor. What I like most about it, is that it makes me enjoy shaving again. Shaving when done right is supposed to be comfortable and refreshing not fast, and rushed. This set is perfect. I like the products. Shaving this way is slow and controlled and great again. Take your time and you will have s great shave. I really like this set
customer_reviews.author: mark cardona

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the take away toiletry bag for my fiancee as a birthday gift. He loved it. The quality of the handles, and attention to detail with every item included is great. Especially for the price. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bronte

customer_reviews.title: Grandpa?
customer_reviews.text: What a great gift and introduction to the wonderful world of wet shaving. The brush is my favorite part. It is full, thick and heavy. Great smells and good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: cptpapa

customer_reviews.title: If the item was as shown in Amazon and stood up to the reviews.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item for my husband and he seems to like it very much. All items were exactly like website. After his first shave his face felt very soft from the oil after shave. I will try to update this as time goes by.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria M

customer_reviews.title: Nephew says, he loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my nephew. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Trader Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Wonderful gift for that special man in your life.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband’s birthday. He was very excited. All came nicely packaged with a beautiful bag. Looks great on the bathroom counter. It is really fine quality. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Minnich

customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriends birthday in the leather bag. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: tomatocheeks4

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Perfect - Just what I needed To give my son
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shaving kit!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. I ordered this as a gift for Father’s Day, it was an amazing gift I bought myself one. Must have buy if you want a great shave!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Giacobbi

customer_reviews.title: My dad loved his gift
customer_reviews.text: My dad loved his gift. The quality is amazing, he loves the shaving cream! Would purchase from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Heather s.

customer_reviews.title: A great way to stop using plastic disposable razors!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my shaving kit from Maison Lambert. The quality of the razor and shaving brush are great and their organic shaving soap and aftershave oil are a pleasure to use.
customer_reviews.author: Chidsey Graphics

customer_reviews.title: Great shaving set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shaving set for my boyfriend and he loves it! I couldn’t be happier with my choice!
customer_reviews.author: dee

customer_reviews.title: Classy set offering a clean smooth shave. Requires you ...
customer_reviews.text: Classy set offering a clean smooth shave. Requires you to watch a YouTube video to use properly and get a blade disposal. If you’re not dedicated then don’t purchase. It’s time consuming.
customer_reviews.author: SummerGulfCoast

customer_reviews.title: You get ALL that you see in the pictures
customer_reviews.text: This product was awesome. Bought it for Father’s Day and my dad loves it. Came as advertised. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: David Ibarra

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: My wife got this for my birthday and I was impressed with quality and craftsmanship I'm hooked
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Excelente product easy to use and also really Nice kit
customer_reviews.author: jose acevedo

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: This set is beautiful!! Can't wait for him to open it Christmas morning. Thank you :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My husband LOVED this shaving kit
customer_reviews.text: My husband LOVED this shaving kit! He stated that the razor gave a nice close shave with the old fashioned shaving soap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the kit
customer_reviews.text: I love the kit, shaving takes much longer, but it's actually enjoyable rather than a chore. The after shave balm is incredible! My daughter's insist I let them know when I shave so they can smell my face after. Only thing they could add is a pre shave oil to really complete the kit.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Humphries

customer_reviews.title: Fanastic
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! You can tell time and care is put in this shave kit. Very well made! Worth every dime.
customer_reviews.author: baylee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a Christmas gift and my husband loved it said it gave him the closest shave.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set!
customer_reviews.text: This set is wonderful! It arrived very quickly and everything is a very nice quality. My boyfriend is very happy and so am I!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing set with great craftsmanship!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a father's day present. He absolutely loves it!! The cigar box was such an added bonus! He likes the close shave it gives him. He loves all of the items and the great craftsmanship of the entire kit. He said the body beer soap has a manly smell. The only thing he is worried about is where to get more of the items when he runs out! Great job and excellent presentation!
customer_reviews.author: cltatum

customer_reviews.title: Really! This kit uses a cheap cigar box to ...
customer_reviews.text: Really! This kit uses a cheap cigar box to put everything together. I wouldn't give this as a gift. I would buy the product again but not this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Abdulaziz Almudarra

customer_reviews.title: It was a really nice set up
customer_reviews.text: It was a really nice set up, but my boyfriend was allergic to all the ingredients apparently, so he can't use it. It's nice though
customer_reviews.author: Meice

customer_reviews.title: Quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: Quality!!! Cigar box packing... like. Badger brush with heavy and ornate handle... like. Beer soap... like. After shave oil... like. Shave soap and soap dish... like. Solid construction razor with retractable blade holder... like. I liked everything about this set. Also, if you're looking to save money in the long run, nothing beats shaving with safety razors. You'll spend 10-15 bucks on about 100 blades. Having a fresh and clean blade is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Great gift! My husband loved it and he got more into the soaps and the brushes now. He recommends reading the instruction for a good shave and he watched videos.
customer_reviews.author: josefina

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful kit!
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this shaving kit to my husband for Christmas. From looking at it before wrapping, the contents look well made and top quality. Of course, my husband will give the final verdict. Will follow-up.
customer_reviews.author: BargainG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loved the bag everything came in. His shave is so much better after using this kit and less ingrown hairs as well. The products are so nice and look very expensive. I didn’t know if I wanted to spend $150 on a shave kit, but he really loves it and the quality was worth it. Great gift
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Great Bundle!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for...an all in one shave kit of higher quality. I'm a happy camper!
customer_reviews.author: Smackafatty

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this! Came quickly and adorable customer service! Got a cute email saying thank you for purchasing. The cigar box is awesome. My son loves to store things in it just like I did with cigar boxes as a kid!
customer_reviews.author: MEWY

customer_reviews.title: Loved the smell of the after shave and the soap
customer_reviews.text: I got it as a gift for my dad. Loved the smell of the after shave and the soap, razer seems sturdy and the brush feels heavy and luxurious. Package arrived on the expected date and beautifully packed in a wooden box. Everything is exactly as in pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Y

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful set I’m giving as a Christmas gift and I’m sure my son is going yp love it! The box that it comes in is very cool and an added bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They all loved it and said it was a high quality gift
customer_reviews.text: Was shipped to my house in 2 days. Gave them to my groomsmen as a present. They all loved it and said it was a high quality gift. Might seem expensive but definitely worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Michael Arki

customer_reviews.title: It is a nice close shave and forces me to slow down while ...
customer_reviews.text: I have never shaved with this type of razor. It is a nice close shave and forces me to slow down while I shave. Cool set and the soap is really gentle on my face. Thanks its great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: But as a birthday present for the hubby he absolutely loved it and it is just a beautiful set
customer_reviews.author: Marlo

customer_reviews.title: ...the absolutely best shaving kit!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for the ultimate shaving kit look no further! This product is absolutely exquisite! The cigar case packaging is quite beautiful and the enclosed items are definitely high end. A perfect gift for the man in your life!
customer_reviews.author: Josette

customer_reviews.title: Wheres the soap bowl!!!
customer_reviews.text: Has everything but a bowl...other than that, I love the product
customer_reviews.author: Brian Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set and love the presentation
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set and love the presentation. I can not wait to give this as a gift to my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully presented shaving kit. Perfect present
customer_reviews.text: Love how the kit is presented in a nice wooden cigar box. The products inside are great although I haven't yet attempted to use the straight razor but I am looking forward to trying it out.
customer_reviews.author: Orn Asbjornsson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Makes for a great gift. Nicely packed with appealing products.
customer_reviews.author: Steven J

customer_reviews.title: My Man Has Made Headway and it Turns Me On!
customer_reviews.text: I adored this whole set, my man actually is shaving daily now, I love the closeness of the safety razor...the next step is straight edge and I'll be happy. The fact that he no longer runs about in stubble is FANTASTIC, I don't think men realize Yes we can see that double chin starting and Yes you look slovenly SHAVE tuck you shirt in dazzle me with a night out with you clean shaven in a real suite and I'll wear my stiletto's, we'll dance till dawn! After all, I married a man not a boy.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twain

customer_reviews.title: Class and quality.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome kit full of quality products. The seller sent a personal email about his business and family, classy touch. I purchased this kit for my boyfriend and he'd been using it for the last few weeks and loves it. Great for someone with sensitive skin and appreciation for the finer things.
customer_reviews.author: Dayton

product_meta.title: Maison Lambert Ultimate Shaving Kit Set with Organic Shaving Soap, Aftershave Oil, Wood Shaving Bowl, 100% Pure Black Badger Shaving Brush and Double Edge Safety Razor with 10 Blades.
feature_bullets: Handmade in the pure French tradition

All you need to create the perfect shaving: double edge safety razor with 10 astra blade, 100% pure black badger hair, organic shaving soap, organic aftershave, organic pre shave oil, and a stainless steel shaving stand
Made of luxurious ingredients: organic argan oil, jojoba oil, cocoa butter, and aloe vera
No animal testing - Nasty Chemical free - Free of Parabens, Sulfates, Dyes, Toxins, artificial fragrances, Ethyl Alcohol, Phenoxyethanol, DEA and petroleum oil!
